content: inst cid 162 cid 167 ctions cast on 140 sts or if you want to make an adjustment for size cast on any mul cid 415 ple of 10 sts being careful not to twist sts join to work in round and place marker to show beginning of round for the brim k1 p1 around for 5 rounds round 1 and all other odd rounds k around round 2 *yo ssk k2tog yo k1 repeat from * around round 4 *k1 yo ssk k3 k2tog yo k2 repeat from * around round 6 *k2 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k3 repeat from * around round 8 *k3 yo s1k2p yo k4 repeat from * around rounds 10 12 and 14 *ssk k2 yo k1 yo k2 k2tog k1 repeat from * around repeat rounds 1-14 four more cid 415 mes then work rounds 1-9 to finish off the pa cid 425 ern work k1 p1 around for 5 rounds bind off loosely cut yarn leaving a 6 tail then weave in all ends cong cid 162 at cid 167 lations you ve now completed your very own choue cid 425 e cowl i hope you enjoyed this fun kni cid 427 ng pa cid 425 ern be sure to sign up for our email newsle cid 425 er so you don t miss the next one also i d love to see your work tag me in your photos on instagram using @thechesapeakeneedle #thechesapeakeneedle and #choue cid 425 ecowl so that i can find you easily i just might share your photos on my page if you had fun using this pa cid 425 ern please consider sharing the link with a friend who might like to make it too you can also find me on pinterest thechesapeakeneedle ravelry lindseyfaciane and instagram @thechesapeakeneedle see you there
